name: Space Not-So Shooter
description:
For the GMKT Game Jam I made a Space Shooter with a twist. A Space shooter where you can't shoot!

Instructions

Use the Arrow Keys to WASD to move the Space Ship
There is no way you can shoot!
You will have to rely on the enemies bullets and deflect them!
Use the space-bar to turn on the deflector!
Don't forget to collect the power-ups!

Credits 

Sprites, fonts and SFX- https://kenney.nl/
Background music - https://jimmyjohn99.itch.io/freegamemusic999

Bugs- Restart does not work.
